text:
How do I add doc string to a function that is defined inside an `@eval` block?
```julia> for (func, t) in [(:foo, Any)]
           @eval begin
               "$func is cool"
               $func(x) = x + 1
           end
       end
ERROR: UndefVarError: func not defined```
